description: Joey Stefano and Jon Vincent drive down the coast and check in at Paradise Guest House.  Once they are in their room, Joey leaves Jon in the room and goes back up to the front desk see Steve Kreig.  Since no one is around Joey comes on strong to Steve.  It's not long until Steve is kicking back and Joey has his mouth full of Steve.  Joey wants to get fucked bad and is happy to bend over the front desk.  Steve has a surprise for Joey that he keeps in his desk drawer to help get Joey nice and loose.
title: Revenge
